name: breezy days daisy tank top
notes:
crochet this stunning tank top composed of 12 granny squares and 4 triangles that are seamed together in a special way! choose a combination of colors or use just one to create this romantic and airy top with a delicate picot edging!

note that the **free version** of this crochet pattern can be found on my blog [**here**][1]!

if you loved crocheting the “**breezy days daisy bag**”, you’ll enjoy making this garment using the exact same daisy granny square!

please reference these two videos:

* how to crochet the daisy granny square
  **[here][2]** 
* how to crochet the breezy days daisy tank top **[here][3]**

the single-colored tank top sample uses "ecru" and the mult-colored tank top sample uses "cool grey" (color a), "ecru" (color b) and "goldenrod" (color c).


here are the number of skeins required for each size (**single-colored**):

• small: 3 skeins 
• medium & large: 4 skeins
• xl & 2x: 5 skeins 
• 3x: 6 skeins 
• 4x: 7 skeins
• 5x: 8 skeins


here are the number of skeins required for each size (**multi-colored**):

• small & medium: 3 skeins of color a, 1 skein of color b, 1 skein of color c
• large & xl: 4 skeins of color a, 1 skein of color b, 1 skein of color c
• 2x: 5 skeins of color a, 1 skein of color b, 1 skein of color c
• 3x & 4x: 6 skeins of color a, 1 skein of color b, 1 skein of color c
• 5x: 7 skeins of color a, 1 skeins of colorb, 1 skein of color c

please reference the crochet pattern to see the size chart and to reference the final dimensions of the granny squares for each size.
